[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-faucet/core/src/server/run.rs] [Function: test_redis_ratelimiter()] [Redis Connection Hijacking] At line 650-662, Redis is used for rate limiting - can attackers connect to Redis directly to reset rate limit counters? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-faucet/core/src/server/run.rs] [Function: test_transfer_health()] [Service Degradation] At lines 785-792, the service becomes unavailable when funds are low - is there a graceful degradation or does it abruptly stop serving all requests? (Low)
